results.description: Looking after his family is one way Danny McGuire copes with the pressure of helping Hull KR avoid relegation.
results.shortTitle: 'Rugby's important, but I don't take it home with me'
results.title: Danny McGuire: Hull KR half-back on coping with Qualifiers pressures

results.description: Gareth O'Brien's late drop-goal beats reigning champions Leeds to edge Toronto closer to their Super League dream.
results.shortTitle: Toronto win at Leeds to eye Super League
results.title: Qualifiers: Toronto Wolfpack beat Leeds 17-16 to close in on Super League aim

results.description: Salford Red Devils are all-but mathematically safe in Super League after they beat a dogged Toulouse Olympique 44-10.
results.shortTitle: Salford secure Super League spot with Toulouse win
results.title: Qualifiers: Salford Red Devils beat Toulouse 44-10 to secure Super League status

results.description: Six into four will not go - Dave Woods assesses the scramble for Super League spots in 2019 via the Qualifiers.
results.shortTitle: The 'wacky race' for four Super League spots
results.title: Qualifiers: The 'wacky' scramble for Super League spots in 2019

thumbnail.altText: Chase Stanley scores a try for Toronto Wolfpack

results.description: The Rugby Football League pick a 19:00 BST kick-off time for the Million Pound Game to suit three different time zones.
results.shortTitle: Evening kick-off for Million Pound Game
results.title: Million Pound Game: RFL pick 19:00 kick-off to suit England, France or Canada

thumbnail.altText: Toronto Wolfpack have won all three meetings so far this season with their likely Million Pound Game opponents Toulouse, the heaviest of them 43-30 at Magic Weekend in May

results.description: Salford will be without half-back Jackson Hastings for two games after he is suspended for a high tackle.
results.shortTitle: Salford lose Hastings to two-game ban
results.title: Jackson Hastings: Salford lose key half-back to two-game ban

results.description: Leeds Rhinos and Hull KR both win in the Qualifiers to move closer to retaining their Super League status.
results.shortTitle: Leeds and Hull KR win to edge towards safety
results.title: Qualifiers: Leeds Rhinos and Hull KR win but Widnes on brink of relegation

results.description: Salford Red Devils take a huge step towards a Super League place with a 28-16 Qualifiers win over Toronto Wolfpack.
results.shortTitle: Salford see off Toronto to stay unbeaten
results.title: Qualifiers: Salford Red Devils beat Toronto Wolfpack 28-16 to retain 100% record

thumbnail.altText: Joey Lussick tackled by Andrew Dixon

results.description: Greg Eden scores three of the six tries as Castleford hand out a Super 8s hammering to Challenge Cup winners Catalans Dragons.
results.shortTitle: Six-try Castleford too much for Dragons
results.title: Super 8s: Castleford Tigers 36-4 Catalans Dragons

thumbnail.altText: Jake Trueman scored the third of Castleford's four tries against the Challenge Cup winners

results.description: Wakefield Trinity all but end Huddersfield Giants' top-four hopes with a brilliant comeback win at the John Smith's Stadium.
results.title: Super 8s: Huddersfield Giants 16-42 Wakefield Trinity

results.description: Wigan deny local rivals St Helens the chance to secure the League Leaders' Shield with a stunning 30-10 derby win.
results.title: Super 8s: St Helens 10-30 Wigan Warriors

results.description: Hull FC concede a club-record 80 points in one match as Bryson Goodwin scores five times in a 14-try Warrington rout.
results.title: Super 8s: Warrington Wolves 80-10 Hull FC

results.title: Listen to live Super 8s and Qualifiers commentary

results.description: Joel Moon's hat-trick helps Leeds Rhinos continue their unbeaten Qualifiers run despite a London Broncos fight-back.
results.shortTitle: Leeds stay unbeaten with win at Broncos
results.title: Qualifiers: Leeds Rhinos remain 100% with 48-32 win at London Broncos

results.description: Craig Hall helps Hull KR punish his former club Toronto Wolfpack by scoring in a 28-22 Qualifiers win at Lamport Stadium.
results.title: Qualifiers: Hull KR beat Wolfpack in Toronto while Salford and Toulouse win

results.description: Toronto Wolfpack face Hull Kingston Rovers in The Qualifiers - listen to BBC Radio Humberside commentary.

results.description: Jarrod Sammut is the London Broncos hero as his drop goal adds to struggling Widnes' misery in the Qualifiers.
